name: eDoc Easy Tables – Best WordPress Table Maker
author: eDoc Intelligence LLC

sections.description:
Detailed Features | Youtube Video Tutorial | Demo

Looking for a fast, easy to manage table builder plugin? eDoc Easy Tables takes the headache out of making new responsive table layouts with our out-of-the-box easy to use table builder plugin. Make multiple tables fast. Delegate table management to any user, on a table by table basis. Get up and running FAST!

IF you want complex, time-consuming, manual reading, support intensive tables, checkout some of the OTHER WP table plugins.

IF you are looking for a WordPress table builder plugin that is EASY, we are a great choice.

Features

  • Responsive Table Layout: Looks great on desktops, tablets and mobile devices without you needing to code a single thing
  • Theme Matching Style: We assume you want a table that matches and looks like it belongs on your website. We also assume you do not want to spend precious time writing CSS to tinker with it. Easy.
  • Multiple Tables: Many websites that need one table, may need another we have found. We allow you to create as many as you want, and they operate independently.
  • Metrics Reporting: You can specify an email and get automatic reports emailed to you weekly of how many people are accessing and using your tables. Track downloads and clicks.
  • Delegate Access: Allow other users to maintain tables on your website by inputting their userID.
  • Intuitive Layout: Easy to set up. Easy to edit. Fast to deploy. We value your time.

Types of WordPress Tables you can create

You can build any type of table, but here are a few suggested use cases.

  • Data Tables
  • Amazon Affiliate Tables
  • Reporting and compliance and meetings
  • Member List Table
  • Any type of Sortable and Searchable Data Table
  • Document Library with downloadable links
  • Score points tables
  • Product Data sheet downloads
  • Any tabular format

WORDPRESS TABLE PLUGIN LIVE VIDEO PREVIEW

Supporting Future Development

If you like Edoc Easy Tables, RATE and REVIEW it PLEASE! Thanks!!!

Easy Table Setup

Simple and quick click and add tables. Add additional columns on the fly. Please set content type correctly during column creation.

Bug Reports
Bug reports for eDoc Easy Tables are welcome on GitHub. Please no feature requests on GitHub. Please no support requests on GitHub. Do that on WordPress forums please. Link above or to the right ->

Tags

table, table builder, table plugin, wordpress tables, table maker, wp table, responsive table

Copyright and licensing

You can contact us at plugins@edocintelligence.com for customizations and support
sections.installation:
1. Upload the edoc-easy-tables folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the eDoc Easy Tables plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Configure the plugin by going to the eDoc Easy Tables menu that appears in your admin menu
sections.faq:
• Can I update a column type once it is created?
    • Not currently. We have this on a feature list for next release
  • Can I add individual users to admin a table?
    • YES! Add the username to the username field on the specific tables you wish to have someone admin. Once they log into the backend they will be able to edit that table they have permission for.
  • Can I get reports on activity?
    • Yes! We have a CSV emailed to the admin on a weekly basis. This contains information on the amount of activity for a “download” type column.
  • Can I update the CSS for the tables?
    • You can but the template CSS styles for TR TD TABLE will be used by default. If you have a template that does not have these styles then it will look weird out of the box. We suggest you add bootstrap generic table CSS. We will have a styles selector override built in future versions, so you may wish to just wait.
Support?

Support questions, bug reports, or feature requests submitted via WordPress Forums. Thanks!
sections.changelog:
1.29

Release Date: February 26th, 2021

  • Bugfixes:
    • Updated plugin to be compatible with PHP7.4 and WordPress 5.2+

1.28

Release Date: March 28th, 2019

  • Bugfixes:
    • Updated plugin to be compatible with PHP7 and WordPress 5.

1.27

Release Date: September 11th, 2017

  • Enhancements:
    • Fixed missing icons.
    • Updated to WP 4.8.1.

1.26

Release Date: November 18th, 2016

    • Updated Icons for better readability.
    • Added Screenshots.

    • Added Screenshots.

1.24

Release Date: November 18th, 2016

  • Enhancements:
    • Overhaul of UX elements. Modern card based layout for table generation.
    • Mobile enhancements.

1.23

Release Date: November 17th, 2016

  • Bugfixes:
    • Corrected issue causing errors.

1.22

Release Date: November 8th, 2016

  • Enhancements:

    • Included a new video walkthrough for tutorial.

  • Bugfixes:

    • Corrected issue with CSS.

short_description: Easiest WordPress table builder with Responsive theme styles, reporting and management built-in. Delegated editing and weekly usage reports.
